casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Lee ROSSER. No. 315P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Annie M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Philip E. Berger, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of July 2008 by Defendant to Review Order Denying Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
